name: postiz-extension
description: Postiz browser extension for cookie-based platform authentication

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && vite build && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip .
scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && HOT_RELOAD_EXTENSION_VITE_PORT=8081 NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e ../../.env -- vite build --config vite.config.chrome.ts --mode development --watch
